rules.description: 1. Kana to R_Option. (Post Enter if pressed alone)
1. Spacebar to L_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
1. Left,Right Command to Left,Right Command. (Post Left Eisu,Kana if pressed alone)
2. Eisu + U,O to Home,End (if press with Command then Top,Bottom
2. Eisu +  , , .  to Scroll Down , Scroll Up
3. Eisu + E,R to Kill line , Open Line
3. Eisu + Semicolon , p to Tab , S-Tab
3. Eisu + U , Kana to left , right click
4.Eisu S , Q , W , T , / , N , Ctrl to Save , Quit , Close , NewTab , New , Command Tab
8. Eisu + spacebar to open Alfred app
